title: S3cco
author: S3cco
content: Intents and Restaking | November 16, 2023 @ Devconnect IstanbulEvent Website: https://multichainerc20.com/The benefits of the Ethereum network should be easily accessible and available globally and to everyone with little to no barriers to entry. Multichain ERC20 is about bringing together the greatest and most inspired minds to build the future of web3.They want you to leave seeing a clear path forward and excited about what is to come for Ethereum.Events such as this are where people come together and new ideas are born. If you would like to present, have any thoughts, comments, ideas, or questions please reach out.

comments.author: S3cco
comments.body: Restaking Cloud and PoN Network to Host Multichain Day at Devconnect 2023 https://bitcoingarden.org/restaking-cloud-and-pon-network-to-host-multichain-day-at-devconnect-2023/Speakers at Multichain Day in alphabetical order include Blockswap Labs, Cowswap, Dappnode, Diva, El Dorado, Enso, Essential, Ether.fi, Fractal, Hopr, Ion Protocol, Kurtosis, Meta Pool, Movement Labs, Nimbora, Propellerheads, Shutter, SSV.Network, and Versatus. Multichain Day, brings together visionaries, developers, investors, and enthusiasts to discuss the latest infrastructure advancements and innovations in web3. The two event tracks have different objectives for the wider web3 community....
